name: Pitcher
description: The player who throws the ball to the batter from the pitcher's mound.

name: Catcher
description: Positioned behind home plate, receives pitches and calls the game.

name: First Baseman
description: Defends first base and receives throws from infielders.

name: Second Baseman
description: Defends second base and turns double plays.

name: Third Baseman
description: Defends third base, requires quick reflexes and a strong arm.

name: Shortstop
description: Positioned between second and third base, usually the most athletic infielder.

name: Left Fielder
description: Defends the left portion of the outfield.

name: Center Fielder
description: Covers the middle portion of the outfield, usually the fastest outfielder.

name: Right Fielder
description: Defends the right portion of the outfield, typically with the strongest arm.

name: Designated Hitter
description: In American League games, bats in place of the pitcher.
